name: Student Planner Notion Template
description: Are you a student looking to supercharge your productivity and organization? This Student Planner Notion Template has you covered!Key Features:Student Dashboard: Get an at-a-glance overview of your tasks, assignments, and exams from all your courses.Course Timeline: Keep track of important dates with a dynamic course timeline.Course Management:Courses Page: Easily view and manage all your courses.Individual Course Page: Dive deep into each course with linked assignments and exams. Calculate your
features: Student Dashboard:Get an at-a-glance overview of your tasks, assignments, and exams from all your courses.; Course Timeline:Keep track of important dates with a dynamic course timeline.; Courses Page:Easily view and manage all your courses.; Individual Course Page:Dive deep into each course with linked assignments and exams. Calculate your grades, take lecture notes, and manage textbooks and readings.; Focus Zone:Stay on track with a built-in Pomodoro timer. Boost your focus with YouTube and Spotify integrations.; Week View:Plan your week efficiently with a week view and calendar widget.; Archive:Keep your workspace clutter-free by archiving completed tasks.; Smart Button:Easily create pre-made layouts with just a click of a button.; A  device to access your notion planner (e.g. Computer, Laptops, Phones, and Tablets); A Notion Account (It's free to sign up!)
